name: The Great Cheese Fair
description: I can't wait to eat some cheese! I want the cheese fair to happen before the grand ball

name: The Grand Ball
description: The grand ball must be splendid! I wish it to take place before the harvest festival

name: The Harvest Festival
description: All the villagers will rejoice! Let the harvest festival occur before anything else

name: The Jousting Tournament
description: I can't wait to see the knights clash! Let the tournament be held before the midsummer feast

name: The Midsummer Feast
description: The feast will be grand! I wish it to happen before the royal parade

name: The Royal Parade
description: The kingdom will celebrate! Make the royal parade occur before any other event

name: The Dragon Hunt
description: I hope the dragon hunt is thrilling! I want it to happen before the lantern festival

name: The Lantern Festival
description: The lanterns will shine bright! Schedule it before the king's banquet

name: The King's Banquet
description: The nobles will feast! Let the king's banquet occur before all else
